title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 21 June 2016 - XWiki
content:

10:08 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:26 <Pbas> k ty  
10:39 <woshilap1n> has quit  
10:42 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
10:45 <cjd> hey woshilapin, how's comcast treating you ?  
10:47 <vmassol> hi woshilapin: r u in the states now? :)  
11:08 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:15 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:48 <acotiuga> hello @Vincent  
11:48 <vmassol> hehe  
11:48 <vmassol> hi alex  
11:48 <vmassol> question for you  
11:49 <vmassol> on http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Ratings+Application#HScreenshots what is the first screenshot?  
11:49 <vmassol> ah yes I get it  
11:49 <vmassol> first one is when you use it on a page  
11:49 <vmassol> second one is from EM UI  
11:49 <vmassol> would be nice if you could add some legends maybe  
11:49 <acotiuga> yes, let me add some text  
11:49 <vmassol> thx  
11:51 <vmassol> btw this should maybe be part of the EM app doc?  
11:52 <vmassol> ah it's already there: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Extension+Manager+Application nice ;)  
11:52 <vmassol> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Extension+Manager+Application#HRating  
12:17 <vmassol> Enygma`: can I commit on master?  
12:17 <vmassol> (platform)  
12:18 <vmassol> if you haven't released platform yet that would be great since it would fix the issue with markdown not working anymore  
12:19 <Enygma`> vmassol: did not start the build yet  
12:19 <vmassol> ok cool  
12:19 <Enygma`> was waiting for the current job to finish building  
12:19 <Enygma`> if you`re sure about what you want to commit, go ahead  
12:27 <lkrejci> has quit  
12:27 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
12:57 <flashdel> has quit  
12:59 <flashdel> has joined #xwiki  
13:57 <lkrejci> has quit  
13:57 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
14:27 <sorinello> has quit  
14:49 <Pbas> hum... http://extensions.xwiki.org down again.  
14:54 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
14:54 <vmassol> should be ok now  
14:55 <Pbas> yes ty  
14:55 <Pbas> I have another problem with mail list  
14:55 <Pbas> When I send a mail at xwiki users list  
14:55 <Pbas> I didn't receive a copy of my mail  
14:56 <vmassol> Pbas: that"s easy  
14:56 <Pbas> I checked my conf on sympa  
14:56 <vmassol> do you receive other mails?  
14:56 <vmassol> if yes then the issue is not on xwiki's side  
14:56 <lkrejci> has quit  
14:56 <Pbas> yep but note mine and I don't know if my mail is going to the list or in a ean  
14:57 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
14:57 <vmassol> you can check this easily  
14:57 <vmassol> using markmail  
14:57 <vmassol> http://xwiki.markmail.org/  
14:57 <Pbas> ha yes, is it a problem with my mail provider?  
14:57 <vmassol> that should help you understand where the problem is  
15:01 <tmortagne> Pbas: maybe your provider is trying to be clever, Gmail does not show me as a new mail coming from the mailing list a mail I sent to it  
15:02 <tmortagne> I'm happy to not get any duplicate but indeed you have to go see somewhere else if it actually ended up on the mailing list as expected  
15:04 <Pbas> yep it is my problem  
15:05 <Pbas> I checked My Spam folder: empty  
15:06 <Pbas> I'm on yahoo mail with spamguard (I will check here: avoid spamgard for my email maybe)  
15:06 <vmassol> it's not related to spam  
15:06 <vmassol> since otherwise you'd receive some of your mail  
15:12 <acotiuga> has quit  
15:12 <xwiki\_finstern> has quit  
15:18 <Enygma`> Pbas: sorry for overwriting your release notes changes. Just noticed it (before I was about to overwrite you again! :) )  
15:18 <Enygma`> noticed you`ve fixed it yourself  
15:20 <Pbas> np, I wonder that you didn't see my tiny note :)  
15:20 <Enygma`> had the editor opened in a tab  
15:21 <Pbas> yes and probably session timed out (because I hadn't a page locked)  
15:22 <vmassol> not sure I understand this sentence "Possible values in hidden, text, list, number (boolean and multilistsince 8.2M2) multilist allows to select multiple values of same property and displayed a multiselect list."  
15:23 <vmassol> "Valid values are: …" ?  
15:23 <vmassol> ah I think it's missing a dot too  
15:23 <vmassol> and boolean and multisleect shouldn't be in parenthesis  
15:23 <vmassol> (if I understand correctly)  
15:24 <vmassol> they're valid values same as the others, no?  
15:24 <vmassol> (Pbas)  
15:25 <Pbas> Valid values are:  hidden, text, list, number, boolean or multililist  
15:25 <vmassol> ok I'll fix it  
15:25 <Pbas> ok thxs  
15:27 <vmassol> let me know if it's ok: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Livetable+Macro#HAllacceptedvalues-2  
15:27 <vmassol> (to be sure I understood)  
15:28 <Pbas> yes it's fine  
15:28 <vmassol> just rewored again  
15:28 <vmassol> \*reworded  
15:28 <vmassol> ok cool thx  
15:30 <Pbas> np, thxs  for your work on xwiki, everbody  
15:31 <vmassol> and thanks for your help too!  
15:31 <Pbas> :-)
